name: Summon Sorceress
text:
2+ monsters with the same Type, except Tokens
If this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 monster from your hand in Defense Position, to your opponent's zone this card points to. You can target 1 face-up monster this card points to; Special Summon 1 monster from your Deck in Defense Position, with the same Type as that monster, to a zone this card points to, but negate its effects. During the turn you Special Summon from the Deck with this effect, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except monsters with the same original Type as the monster you Special Summoned from the Deck. You can only use this effect of "Summon Sorceress" once per turn.
